onSubmit(){ Vue.$toast.default('Please wait data is processing!'); let formdata = new FormData(); formdata.append("name", this.name); formdata.append("description", this.description); formdata.append("thembunail", this.thembunail); formdata.append("id", this.editId); axios.post('/portal/service/store',formdata).then((res)=>{ setTimeout(() => { Vue.$toast.success('New service has been saved'); }, 1500); }); }, Vue.filter("projectstatus", function(value) { switch (value) { case 1: return "inprocess "; break; case 0: return "pending "; break; case 2: return "completed "; break; case 3: return "cancel "; break; default: return "pending "; break; } });
